campaign.story:
Before we begin, there are three things you should know:
1. These products start shipping in May 2021. You won't have to pick which phone case/model you want until then.
2. Back NOW to lock in Kickstarter-exclusive prices (up to 30% off!).
3. Like what you see but not ready to commit? Pick the $1 reward titled "Back Now, Pick Later." You won't have to pick which products you want until we're ready to ship them, and you'll still get that sweet Kickstarter discount.
Now, onto the good stuff:

Meet Mobile.
Mobile by Peak Design is a protective, slim, beautiful phone case and an ecosystem of mounts, accessories and chargers that mount to it. We turn that slippery little super computer in your pocket into a machine that can truly keep up with your life.
We've reimagined every freakin' way you interact with your phone and added utility, strength, and thoughtful UX. Oh yeah and everything we've made is built-to-last (we guarantee all these accessories to outlast your phone).
Already know you want to order these products? Never backed a Kickstarter? Love Adam? Watch this video:
Okay so now let's get into what the marketing team refers to as the high level benefit statements:
Safe and secure means bulky and cumbersome, right? WRONG, actually. Protection shouldn't penalize your pockets. You don't want over-engineered, you want correctly-engineered.
Our phone case protects (your phone), respects (your pockets), connects (to our ecosystem), and it does it all with some of that famous Peak Design engineering know-how. Activate x-ray goggles: 
To recap: a lightweight polycarbonate chassis surrounded by a molded bumper of thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) with a laminated skin of 210d recycled poly/nylon fabric (looks good, feels good, thin as hell) featuring a rugged PU coating and right in the middle of it all is our brand new, 2.4mm thin SlimLink Mounting System with a zirconia ceramic locking insert and array of magnets. Yes, there will be a quiz at the end of the page.
Meet the Loop, an immediately deployable, mega comfortable, super durable little grip-assistant that we've engineered into the back of our phone case without making the case any thicker. (Not a grip kinda person? No worries, the Everyday Case comes both with and without the Loop.)
It's our Everyday Case with even more functionality. The exact same 2.4mm thinness, but with the added functionality of the deployable 'Loop'. There is no wasted space here: we are using every part of the animal.

All of our Mobile products utilize our brand new SlimLink Mounting System. SlimLink has dual locking mechanisms: a soft lock made possible by a magnetic array embedded in our cases and mounts, and for for more demanding applications mounts a hard lock made possible by a zirconia ceramic insert that interfaces with mechanical claws on our most rugged mounts. No other phone mounting system has the same combination of slimness, magically easy UX, ruggedness, and looks.
Got a phone case you are emotionally attached to or a phone we aren't yet making a case for? Then nab our Universal Adapter. It attaches with a super strong adhesive to most cases and phone backs and unlocks all the connection magic of our Mobile ecosystem:
We are in this for the long haul: SlimLink is our new standard for phone mounting. Mounts, accessories, and chargers you buy right now for your current phone will work just as well with your next phone. And then the phone after that. And the phone after that. And so on and so forth until we all have microchips installed directly into our brains or whatever.

 We use premium materials and manufacturing processes to build products that last. You can depend on these mounts and accessories to be around. And in the unlikely event that something falls apart before its time, our lifetime guarantee and world-renowned customer service team will take care of you in no time.
We believe good environmental policy starts with thoughtful products (making products that last a long time with heavy use is much better for the environment than making products that don’t) and we are proud members of the following incredible orgs: Climate Neutral, 1% For The Planet, Certified B Corporation. 

To be able to use all of the Peak Design mounts and accessories, you must have either a Peak Design Everyday Case or Universal Adapter. To use just our soft-locking products, you can use our case or adapter OR a case of phone compatible with Apple's MagSafe system.

      Do you have an iPhone 11, 12, or Samsung S20? Get our Everyday Case!
      Don’t have one? Then our Universal Adapter is for you!


A note on why we keep coming back to Kickstarter. 
We've mentioned it a few times already: this is our 10th Kickstarter campaign.
We launch our products on Kickstarter because it gives us the freedom to run our business exactly how we want. The funds we generate on Kickstarter make it possible for us to continue developing products without seeking outside investors. That means we're not beholden to growth goals, revenue targets, or product timelines imposed by other people. Instead, we focus on doing what we love: building the best things we can possibly make, fueled by support from the best customers we could possibly ask for.

                                From the beginning, our backers have steered the direction of our product roadmap, both with their feedback, and with direct participation in our design process via surveys and focus groups. This close collaboration is made possible by communication and community-building tools of the Kickstarter platform.
Thank you for letting us continue on this incredible journey. We cannot wait to get these products into your hands.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our 10th Kickstarter project since 2011. As with all of our campaigns, we're launching products that are late in the design phase, but still undergoing final tweaks. The items you receive might look a little different that what you see pictured in our video. But, that's part of the fun of backing a Kickstarter campaign: you're joining us for the ride as we bring these products to life. Inherently, you're taking on a little more risk than if you waited until these products were available for sale on Amazon. But you're also receiving a reward: you'll get these products first, and at a significant discount (up to 30% off!). You'll also get an intimate look into our process, as we'll be sharing design and testing updates throughout the campaign.

Throughout the years we've gotten pretty darn good at setting accurate expectations and delivering on our promises. But no matter how much we've got our poop in a group (official midwestern terminology) things can still go awry. If they do, we solemnly promise to give you full transparency into the issues and solve them in a way that leaves our backers happy and proud to support our company.

Here's a quick rundown of what we see as the top risks that could affect fulfillment:

Risk 1: Apple MagSafe integration doesn't go as expected. Days before we launched this campaign, Apple launched their iPhone 12. With it, they announced MagSafe, a magnetic phone connection system. We are confident that our SlimLink connection system will have a high degree of compatibility with Apple's (see FAQ for details on that). But, we're actively working on the design updates and validation testing to achieve this integration. We could run into an issue that delays fulfillment. Or we could discover a specific compatibility use case that we are unable to solve for. Like we said before, our backers will be coming along for the ride. We plan to post pictures, videos, and updates giving you a detailed look into how our MagSafe compatibility testing is going.

Risk 2: There's a worldwide magnet shortage. This is also related to Apple's MagSafe announcement. We expect that many 3rd party mobile accessory developers will be scrambling to develop MagSafe-compatible cases and mounts. We don't know exactly what the world's magnet supply looks like, but we do know that demand is probably going to go up. There's a chance our magnet suppliers might get overwhelmed, which could delay our fulfillment. We don't think this is likely, but this is 2020. Nothing is off the table.

Risk 3: General supply chain and logistical risks. Sometimes a machine or tool breaks. Sometimes a factory loses power for a day. Sometimes we get the wrong parts or materials in. These things happen from time to time and can affect how long it takes to build our products. Global shipping and warehousing logistics is mind-boggling. Hence we outsource that stuff to experts. But even the experts aren't immune to weather, port congestion, and other uncontrollable factors.

Risk 4: Acts of God. We always list this as a risk in our Kickstarter campaigns, usually in a tongue-in-cheek way. But this year is different. We're in a pandemic right now, one that affected many supply chains across the world. We're based in San Francisco, surrounded by land that's been burning for a better part of the summer. Shit happens, and when it does, our first priority is the health and safety of people and communities.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Our phones are brilliant machines that deserve brilliant accessories, not throw-away gadgets. That's why every Peak Design Mobile product is individually serialized, register-able, and guaranteed for life. We're setting up our refurbishment facility to allow us to rework and resell broken products, like we do with our bags and camera gear. Many of our mounts are made from machined, anodized aluminum. These products are designed to last you for many phones to come.
Reusability and recyclability
This is Peak Design's first line of products to feature packaging that is 100% recyclable cardboard stock...no metal, plastics, magnets, or anything that would traditionally need to be separated from your packaging to recycle it. Open the box, grab your product, and drop the box into the recycle bin.
Sustainable materials
All Peak Design phone cases are laminated in high-performance nylon canvas fabric. This fabric provides important functional and aesthetic benefits to our cases. We recently achieved Bluesign approval of this important material, meaning that it is certified to have the lowest possible impact on people and the planet.
Environmentally friendly factories
Peak Design has been building a supply chain in China and Vietnam for 10 years. We've developed a code of conduct for all of our manufacturing partners that includes parameters around employee pay, safety, working conditions, company policies, and sustainability. We invest in 3rd party audits to ensure our factories can meet these goals.
Sustainable Distribution
Peak Design is 100% carbon neutral. That means that zero net greenhouse gases are emitted when making/delivering the Mobile products. We achieve this by measuring the Scope 1-3 carbon footprint of each product, from raw material mining to manufacturing to shipping to the end customer. We then reduce or offset that carbon footprint by purchasing verified carbon offset credits. Peak Design is fully carbon neutral, all the way back to the beginning of our company.

In fact, we co-founded a nonprofit (Climate Neutral) to help businesses of all kinds measure, reduce, and offset the entirety of their carbon emissions generated by making and delivering their products. There are over 150 Climate Neutral Certified brands (and counting). Kickstarter themselves have joined this certification label!
Something else
In addition to the above, we're a Certified B-Corp. We're also members of 1% for the Planet, meaning we donate 1% of our top-line revenue (including the revenue of this project) to environmental nonprofits.

campaign.story:
No more messing around!
Say “hello” to the newest super-sized multi-tool to fit your super-sized life and say “goodbye” to fumbling around with your gear!
Up to 100 lbs of gear, aircraft-grade machine-cut aluminum
Introducing the Heroclip that clips, hangs, and holds more than ever before. Designed with the same revolutionary clip/hook system found in all Heroclips, this is our largest clip yet and allows for more hands free versatility than its predecessors. Heroclip Large doesn’t mess around, it is here to provide the helping hand that you deserve because sometimes, the floor is just not an option.

Heroclip is a twice-patented clip-swivel-hook system that makes everyday and extraordinary life easier for all. Heroclip has a high caliber, carabiner-style clip on one end and a durable hook with a rubber gripping tip on the other. And in-between—two pivots and a swivel. The pivots allow Heroclip to hang in the most awkward spaces and the swivel allows easy access to whatever you need from what you are hanging. Together, Heroclip is infinitely clip-able, hook-able and usable for hanging all your gear needs. And it is made from aircraft-grade aluminum and individually machine-cut!

Heroclip features 

Heroclip replaces many tools...

... and has received rave reviews.

We’re thrilled that our Heroclip line has received amazingly positive from customers. But you asked for more, and we listened -- The larger gate opening and hefty hook size of the Heroclip Large allow you to hang even heavier gear (up to 100 lbs!) from the widest and most awkward objects.

An impressive 40% larger than our Medium clip and with a weight limit of 100lbs or 45 kilograms, Heroclip Large is the ideal choice for sizeable items including suitcases, ice chests, tool boxes, flood lights, outdoor gear, and more of your bigger needs! Do yourself a favor and invest in a hybrid-style clip that helps embrace life’s toughest jobs and adventures.


Colors
Heroclip Large will come in an array of colors, including designs that were directly taken from photographs of adventure photographer Chris Burkard (one of our biggest fans) -- "Tidal" and "Arctic" come from two of our favorite photographs from Chris' book At Glacier's End.
Size & Capacity 
The New Heroclip line-Up
Thanks to your support, the Heroclip family will have a new addition. Check out below how it fits in with our existing line! The new size Large is 40% bigger than the Medium.

Heroclip is different from others.
Add Heroclip Large to your adventure kit or gear bag now by backing our project! 



As a company, we were born from crowdfunding and successfully delivered on three crowdfunding campaigns. Over the past year, with feedback from our customers, we've built several rounds of prototypes of the large size of Heroclip. We have taken everything we learned about manufacturing, quality control and logistics from our previous production runs and created a process to ensure that all of our production goes as smoothly as possible. Our company already has a track record of delivering products on our promises, and we have produced and sold over 650,000 units of product.

Despite our company's success so far, the reality is that producing goods in high enough volume so that they are affordable to all (we truly believe that the Heroclip line will benefit EVERYONE's lives) requires capital.  With your help, we can bring the extended Heroclip line to life!

Based in Seattle, WA, the Heroclip team is dedicated to designing and making products that make adventure of any kind and size more convenient. We believe in making gear that can go with you from activity to activity and like to see our products as “lifestyle catalysts” that enhance your life, no matter what you are doing. Members of our team bike, go on RV trips, ski, hike, raise kids (and dogs) (and cats), remodel homes, go wine tasting, do Crossfit and more, and we love that our products help us with all of these things. We love hearing from our customers about how they use their Heroclips (there are some very creative uses out there!), and we’re excited to hear from you in the future, too.   

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

 The Story
On July 16th, 1969, 51 years ago to this day, NASA set off the Apollo 11 spacecraft with one monumental mission: to land on the moon. By July 20th, 1969--they accomplished the unbelievable. Join us on another mission taking off today.
Announcing....
 Stretch Goal The "Smell of the Moon" unlocks at $700,000 pledged! 
Pick the "Smell of Space" or the "Smell of the Moon" as your reward! 
Together we can unlock the "Smell of the Moon" stretch goal at $700,000 pledged dollars. Then you can select either "The Smell of Space" or "The Smell of the Moon" as your reward! Want both? Select the Buy Two (2) Pledge level.
 The "Smell of the Moon"  
 "[the moon] smells like spent gunpowder", Gene Cernan, Apollo 17 Astronaut.
In addition to the Smell of Space, you can now pledge for your own "Smell of the Moon". Both are based on verified astronaut accounts. How do you get your own bottle? Want both? When we collect your shipping address at the end of the project, you'll be able to select which bottle you want to receive. Pledge for more than one bottle and you can select any combination of the two. You can always change your order later. You will not be charged until August 17th, when the Kickstarter campaign ends. Read the full update here.
 The "Smell of Space" 
"…a rather pleasant metallic sensation... [like] ... sweet-smelling welding fumes, burning metal, a distinct odour of ozone, an acrid smell, walnuts and brake pads, gunpowder, fruit, rum, and even burnt almond cookie."
Decades ago, NASA asked specialists to develop the "smell of space" to help train astronauts before launch into orbit. NASA's goal of simulating Space during training is to eliminate any surprises Astronauts might experience in Outer Space. Astronauts experience a high G Force Centrifuge simulator for blastoff training, carryout extreme underwater to trainings in Zero G weightlessness for when they reach outer space, and learn what to expect for everything in between. After all, it isRocket Science. The history of the "Smell of Space" has been clouded behind various accounts of existence. Ever since the first space walk, astronauts were shocked by the lingering odor when returning back into the spacecraft. Some describe it as gun powder, rum, fruit, seared steak, or a BBQ. The first space tourists also noted a pungent aroma once the hatch opened, 'like burnt cookies'. We had to find out for ourselves...What does space smell like? We dug deep. With a bit of luck (and a beautiful thing called a FOIA request), we found our lead. A perfumer based in the UK. "The smell of space is so distinct that..NASA reached out to [a fragrance maker] to re-create the odor for its training simulations". Bingo. Two exclusive commercial contracts later, a secret shelved formula based on verified astronaut accounts, a very large minimum order of fragrance...and we're all off smelling space! We've had Space Ice Cream...this just takes it a small step further. (Or maybe it's a leap for all man kind?)
 "Will you pledge your support today to help mass manufacturer Eau de Space, so that everyone can experience the 'Smell of Space' for themselves?"  
 We've partnered with award winning perfumers, some of the best in the world, and secured the rights to launch this product exclusively. Our team consists of top Fashion, Tech, Design, and Logistics experience--all with a desire to increase interest in STEM fields through experiential education. Click "Register your School" below to add your STEM program. Eau de Space is our first product launch under this important initiative, and we hope there will be many more. 
"Still on the fence? When's the next time you'll get to smell outer space?"
We're ready to manufacturer the smell and all we need is meet our MOQ (Minimum order Quantity). Then we can bottle and ship the smell of space directly to you.
Buy One, Give One
Tom's founder, Blake Mycoskie founded his shoe company on the "One for One" model. The One for One model is designed so that for every shoe purchased, one is donated to someone in need. This model, and shoe, was so popular that other large companies like Sketchers were inspired to release shoes in a similar fashion, one of which they named "Bobs". 
 "For every bottle of Eau de Space you buy, we're going to donate one to a K-12 Science, Technology, Engineering, Math (STEM) program in need." 
It's a big promise, and isn't the best decision for a company trying to make a profit. But, we really believe in the cause and hope you do too. Imagine if a child that smells Eau de Space today is inspired to become an astronaut, scientist, or engineer. One day, that same child may even become the first human to walk on Mars. That's the kind of impact experiential education has on early teaching programs in the formative years of child development. And it's a really neat mission to be a part of. 
© Eau de Space 2020. The next best thing to being there.

updates.update_content:
Fellow Space Geeks,
We've exited the Mesosphere! The Mesosphere, between 50-80KM above the earth, is where most meteors are vaporized. Believe it or not, some of the material from these vaporized meteors still linger in the layer after burning up. This gives it a higher concentration of iron and other metal atoms long after the meteors disappear from site! Pretty neat. Temperature decreases with height throughout the mesosphere, and the coldest temperatures in Earth's atmosphere (-130F, -90C), are found near the top of this layer ().

In this game, players take control of the Wonderful Ones, heroes from all over the world chosen to defend the Earth from all manner extraterrestrial threats! When the peaceful Blossom City comes under attack by alien invaders, Wonder-Red, Wonder-Blue, and the rest of the Wonderful Ones suit up and unite to save the world!

The young leader of the Wonderful 100. Having just joined the Wonderful Ones after finishing a year of comprehensive training, Earth Defense War III is his first experience in combat.
Though technically still a rookie, he is extremely gifted, achieving a record score in both the written and field sections of the CENTINEL tactical examinations. Brimming with passion for justice, he takes a firm stance against those who threaten peace, but his by the books attitude and serious personality can occasionally rub people the wrong way. Sometimes Red's seriousness crosses the realm of reason, and those around him find getting through to him almost impossible. The opposite is rarer, though, as Red has an incredible memory, and never forgets something after being told.
His deep crimson CENTINEL-Suit boasts balance in all levels of performance, demonstrating diverse aptitude in any mission. The Vulcan Knuckles equipped to both his arms are capable of intense blows and machine-like accuracy, which can be even further increased in power via the "Unite Hand" Unite Morph technique.

A Wonderful One whose cover occupation is as a detective for the Los Angeles Police Department. Though young, he has gained experience and success in a variety of missions: taking down warring mafia families, counter-terrorism, and even taking part in military operations.
Having a strong sense of identity, and a stronger dislike for authority, Blue is not the easiest Wonderful One to deal with in the organization; however, his ability to act quickly and make decisions in the blink of an eye has led to a chain of successful missions. Yet, despite these successes, his hot-headed personality has makes Blue prone lose himself in anger, peppering his record with a significant number of failures.
Blue insists on making a scene for everyone to see, so in combat he acts arrogant, taunting the enemy, and is prone to posturing into different poses that might look "cool." Unfortunately, reactions to his antics are conspicuous in their absence.
Poor at teamwork and preferring to work alone, Blue does not actively try seek meaningful relationships with others. Instead, he accepts only those who are able to prove their skills, but this acceptance leads to a deep respect.
His weapon, the Valiantium Blade, is said to become sharper with every slice, forged with a special alloy able to cut through anything in the galaxy. His Unite Sword can deal lethal blows to even battleships.
Chose to be a Wonderful One due to his incredible skill with firearms and other ranged weapons, Wonder-Green is currently a mere middle school student. Yet, despite his youth, it is said that he can shoot through the hole of a donut a 100 kilometers away, while eating a donut himself.
Possibly due to his privileged upbringing, he often seems to feel like the world revolves around him and is prone to ignoring the reality of his surroundings. He also unwittingly rude, leading to occasional clashes with Blue and Pink; clashes Green himself seems unbothered by. In fact, at least with Pink, he almost seems to enjoy being scolded.
Even during the tensest of missions, he possesses a completely carefree nature; that is until something goes south, then he instantly breaks into panic. Far clumsier than most would ever suspect for a Wonderful One, the world prays that the care with which Green uses his rapid-fire proton gun Christine Daaé is another, more careful, side of him that holds great pride in his position. (Or so the world hopes...)
He has developed a close friendship with Black, as both are similar in age and love video games, comics, cartoons, and general mischief-making. This mischief-making extends to his love of junk food, a forbidden fruit under his parents, but a near constant indulgence as Green partakes in missions far beyond their strict reach.

Chosen to go to the Olympics in gymnastics while still in high school, Wonder-Pink is by far the most flexible and agile of any Wonderful One. She matches this with an advanced proficiency in melee weaponry, specifically with her Beautiful Whip, knit from a next-gen stay-press alloy "Belmont alloy," for which she is unrivaled.
Pink is known for her "laissez-faire" personality, behaving carefree and sunny during even the most severe missions, as if her duties were just another after school club; however, it is that relaxed attitude that, more often than not, spells disaster for the team. Exceedingly sensitive towards trends, she has decorated her issued weapon with a variety of accessories, and her tendency to prioritize fashion over the mission can occasionally give her superiors headaches. Nevertheless, Pink's excellent physical aptitude and peerless acrobatics have led the team to countless victories.
Extremely emotional, she sometimes reveals her terrifying true colors when angered. Pink is especially sensitive to anything said by Green, and she will gladly turn her tormentor into her whipping boy when set off.
Plus many many more heroes!
In The Wonderful 101: Remastered, you don’t just control a single superhero. You control a whole team, united to face off against the forces of evil. As you travel around the city, you’ll rescue civilians, who will then join your cause, bolstering your ranks.
The Wonderful Ones have more than just numbers on their side. To solve puzzles and smash evil, the Wonderful Ones can perform a “Unite Morph”, combining together to create fists, swords, bridges and other incredible constructs.
Together with Wonder Red, Wonder Blue, and the rest of the Wonderful Ones, it’s time to save Blossom City, and the rest of the world!
The most powerful tool for the Wonderful Ones is the incredible Unite Morph. By combining together, the Wonderful Ones can turn into a variety of awesome shapes, from whips to swords to giant fists.
In-game, players draw specific shapes on the battlefield with the control stick, and the Unite Morph initiates!
Unite Morphing isn’t just for combat, though! The Wonderful Ones can use their powers for traversal as well, whether it’s a faraway ladder or a precarious rope bridge, there’s nowhere The Wonderful 100 can’t reach!
Unite Hand
PLAY

The famous fist of justice used by Wonder Red, Unite Hand is the Wonderful Ones’ most basic Unite Morph. Used to pummel, smash and brutalize foes, the Unite Hand can also be used to rotate cogs and empty gacha monsters of their contents.
Unite Sword
PLAY

While not as strong as the Unite Hand, the Unite Sword has a longer reach, and is sharp enough to cut through chains. As an added bonus, the Unite Sword’s pristine broad side can also reflect lasers back at enemies.
Unite Gun
PLAY

While the Unite Gun isn’t one of the strongest Unite Morphs in the Wonderful Ones' arsenal, it really shines in long distance situations. The gun can hit both enemies and environmental objects, allowing the Wonderful Ones to defeat distant foes or solve otherwise inaccessible puzzles. 
Unite Whip
PLAY

The Unite Whip is a Unite Morph created from combining with a flexible, thorned whip. Not only can it attack enemies from afar, it can also tie them up, making it perfect for dealing with armored foes, spiked walls, and other prickly surfaces. It can also be used to latch onto certain surfaces to swing the whole team over gaps.

campaign.story:
Air Deck 3.0 - Cool playing cards for travelers
Our mission is to make the ultimate travel playing cards. After the success of our first two Air Deck and three Nanobag campaigns, and more than 37k backers later, we’re now ready for our sixth campaign.  
The Air Deck that shuffles and handles like you expect professional cards to do
 Created with feedback from the community, here are our seven new designs: 
Our 7 designs: Red Classic, Electric, Night Sky, Aqua Mandala, Geometric, Retro and Blue Classic
Check out some of the feedback we've received from our Air Deck 2.0 backers.
52 Playing Cards + 2 jokers
Waterproof and washable
Compact travel friendly size
Lightweight
Durable heavy-duty 'casino quality' 0.31mm PVC
Premium printing
Slightly textured on both sides for better handling
Sturdy 0.4mm waterproof synthetic paper tuck box
Playing card size : 3.43 x 1.26 inches (87 x 32mm)

PS. When pledging, just select the number of decks you want. You get to choose which designs you want in the backer survey we send out after the campaign is over.  
Our mission is to create the ultimate playing cards for travelers
The Air Deck 3.0 takes up very little space and easily fits into your pocket
Air Deck 3.0 is made with the same high-quality materials as the original, but there’s a few new things:
Five fresh new designs voted on by our community.
The boxes now have indents to make them easier to open.
We'll be planting even more mangrove trees to offset our emissions many times over. We believe being a climate positive company is important. 1 tree gets planted for every two decks sold.

Five fresh new designs voted on by our community
The boxes now have an indent to make them easier to open

Thank you for helping us reach both our stretch goals!
With the Air Deck 3.0 we did not want to compromise on quality. We went to several of the world’s best manufacturers of premium casino cards and asked for the best materials they could provide. In the process of creating the ultimate travel deck, we tried out over 50 different high-end plastic materials. The materials were taken through scratch, bending and handling tests to identify the best candidate. Finally, we ended up with a premium ‘casino quality’ PVC that has all the properties we want for our deck.    
The Air Deck 3.0 is meticulously cut
The Air Deck is made of a casino quality PVC
 The Air Deck is incredibly resistant to tearing and bending, and is 100% waterproof. You can play with these in the pool, in the boat, in the tub, in the rain, at the beach, pretty much wherever you can think of. 
While regular paper playing cards tear, stain, and break easily, Air Deck 3.0 is extremely durable
The cards are 100% waterproof, so you can use them in the pool, bathtub or even the beach.
You can also wash the cards.

The cards are slightly textured on both sides to provide cushioning and excellent handling
In the process of selecting the material we sought advice from several playing card professionals. The end result is a deck that shuffles and handles like you expect professional cards to do. The cards are slightly textured on both sides to provide cushioning and excellent handling. 
The Air Deck 3.0 shuffles easily

We created the new designs for Air Deck 3.0 with the wonderful supportive feedback we’ve received from our community. Despite their smaller width, the cards are as easy to read as standard sized decks. The full-sized length ensures that they also handle much like regular cards, and the narrower width makes the deck fit nicely in the palm of your hands.
The narrower width makes the deck fit nicely in the palm of your hands
Blue Classic, Aqua Mandala, Night Sky and Red Classic comes with traditional looking face cards, while Retro, Geometric and Electric has a more minimalistic look: 
Our face card designs

Each deck consists of 52 standard playing cards and 2 jokers

We love traveling this beautiful blue ball we call home, and we believe we should care for it as best we can. There’s only one planet earth after all. We consider the Air Deck 3.0 to be an environmentally conscious product to begin with, as it contains half the materials of its competitors, and is made of durable materials which provides a long product life. However, with this campaign we’ve upped our commitment to the planet by planting one mangrove tree for every two decks sold with our tree planting partner, Eden Reforestation Projects.
Mangrove trees are one of the most effective tools to bind CO2 to the soil, thus preventing it from escaping into the atmosphere. A mangrove tree can sequester up to a ton of carbon dioxide by the time it reaches 40 years old. As a bonus, they also help sustain coastal ecosystems, protect shorelines from damage by storms and acts as a filter to maintain water quality.
We will plant mangrove trees with Eden Reforestation Projects

The idea for the original Air Deck was conceived by fellow globetrotters Ursus Negenborn and Rune Kippervik while traveling South East Asia. We love playing cards, and we just couldn’t find a deck that was perfect for carrying at all times. As we’re big fans of optimization, we decided to create the ultimate playing cards for travelers ourselves.
The Air Deck founders

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 950+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $400M raised between them.
Promoted by Palm Tree Digital, the marketing power behind some of the most successful crowdfunding campaigns of 2019. Cutting edge Kickstarter, Indiegogo, and E-commerce marketing.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The designs of the cards have been finalized, and we’ve made the prototypes you see in the video. Since this is our third project, we’ve ironed out the kinks, and we feel confident that we can deliver a great product. Logistics has already been worked thoroughly out, and we will ship tracked to all customers, to ensure a reliable delivery. Our factory is standing by, and will start production as soon as we are funded. As with any project, unforeseen events can occur, but we've done everything we can to keep unknown factors to a minimum. As we are continuously improving our products, there could be minor adjustments to the decks seen in the video.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Nearly one million single-use plastic beverage bottles are sold every minute around the world...
...that said, we are slowly cleaning up our beaches and more of us are switching to reusable bottles, tumblers, and containers than ever before...
...but without proper cleaning, our reusables can become pretty unsanitary, pretty quickly, which is especially risky while traveling and on the go.
Our new, dual-action Cleaning Tablets come 12 per pack and arrive in a recycled, reusable tin.

campaign.story:
This watch is named “Tokiji”. The direct translation from this Japanese is “time numerals” 
The seven segment digit was patented in 1903 for a method of telegraphically transmitting numbers to be printed on tape. The first digital wrist watch was an LED prototype in 1970. Perhaps this type of digit is fading away as our interface design, and display technologies advance, but let’s not forget how they have taken such a prominent place in the background of our everyday lives. Our new Tokiji watch gives them the respect they deserve. These vivid digits are generously spaced on a rich, black dial, surrounded by a handsome, minimal case. 
This watch features a striking display based on a unique approach that we have spent years developing. This breakthrough process is something that we began to develop with our original digital watch, but have refined this process for Tokiji.
All digital watches hide the frame of their liquid crystal display (LCD). This is usually done by printing a masking window on the underside of the watch’s lens. What always irritated us, is that the black of the LCD, and the black of the mask are essentially the same. However, when they are overlapped, the light is refracted, so they always look different. The window’s shape stands out, and is not particularly related to the watch’s overall design. It is simply something that the watch designer has to work around.
Our digital display eliminates this problem with an original process developed by us. After much trial and error,  we found the best way to remove all of the air, and space from between the lens, and the LCD display, so the light can pass straight through. Because the light is now uninhibited, both of these blacks line up perfectly. This allows us to eliminate the window all together, and make our mask the shape of the actual display graphics. 
The result of this process makes for a very deep, and consistent black across the entire watch face to accentuate its vivid digits.
Movement:  custom digital module 
Batteries:  two V371 silver oxide batteries*
Dimensions:  Ø38 x 8.5 mm  / Ø1.5” x 0.35” 
Functions: Time, Date, Alarm, 2nd Timezone, Stopwatch, Backlight
Case: 304 stainless steel 
Lens: hardened mineral glass 
Bands: premium calfskin leather, or stainless steel mesh
Weight with leather band: 50 g / 1.76 oz. 
Weight with mesh band: 70 g / 2.47 oz. 
Water resistance: 3 ATM (30 m / 100') 
Warranty: 2 Years  
In this campaign, we are offering two case styles: uncoated stainless steel, and IP black plated stainless steel. These can be combined with one of three bands: black leather, stainless steel mesh, and IP black stainless steel mesh. Once the Tokiji campaign is complete, we will be in touch every backer directly to take their preference. 
We believe that the products we choose for ourselves, particularly the ones we carry with us throughout the day, are extensions of us. They should act to reinforce our persona, not distract from it. Therefore, as policy, we never display our logo on the face of your watch. Our branding is always close by on the back of the watch. Commonly, this information is etched onto the removable caseback. In this case, ours is set outside of the caseback, to make this an ideal location for etching your personal message. We are planning to offer this service in the near future.
Final assembly, and quality check will be directly overseen by us at our Tokyo studio. 
All of the leather, and mesh bands we produce have release levers attached. No tools are required to easily remove, and replace these bands.
Normal Timepieces packaging, and warranty card.
PLAY

Normal Timepieces was founded by Ross, and Madoka McBride in 2006. Ross is from the United States, but has lived more than half of his life in Tokyo. Madoka is from Hiroshima. Their motivations for creating this brand is an analogy to their relationship itself. It was founded on the combined influences of pioneering mid-century American design, as well as the Japanese sense of minimalism, and craftsmanship. Wikie Sato joined this team in 2015. Her previous experience was perfectly tailored to Normal with her Hong Kong upbringing, graphic design studies in Australia, and work experience the Japanese fashion industry.
If you would like to know more about us, and the Normal brand, you can always see more information on our website <www.normaltimepieces.com>, and through our social media accounts <Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook>.
PLAY

Tokiji in action. 
PLAY

This is a video of us playing with an idea of how to present Tokiji for its first public display. 

SHIPPING
Please note that if you live outside of Japan, we will be sending your order through the postal system by EMS. These shipments are express, and insured. Once sent out, we will email you its tracking number so you can monitor its progress. We will cover the shipping cost. However, you will be responsible for any applicable custom fees that your country’s post office may require for delivery. Additionally, the estimated delivery time is generally 7~14 days. However, this may take a little longer due to the standards of destination country’s postal system.

Tokiji is looking great. If you are a Super Early Bird backer with the standard tempered glass model, your order will be shipped from today - ahead of schedule. The sapphire crystal version is coming up just behind.   
Normal Timepieces

Just to let you all know, everything is coming along to schedule. We are currently assembling, testing, and quality checking the firs batch of watches with tempered glass lenses. We receive the sapphire crystal lenses next week, and will start putting those together a soon as they arrive. Everything is looking great. 
Here is a taste of what we are doing at our Tokyo studio:

Dear Everyone,
Things are chugging along according to schedule. No problems yet!
We just sent you the survey to get your watch / brand preference, and shipping information, but now realize that we worded it in a confusing way. 
If you paid an additional ¥2,000 for an additional band, we have this in our records. In the survey, you can see where to choose your extra band. However, if you did not pay for the extra band, you still need to select a band in this section. This online form does not allow you to leave it blank. Please just select any band in here for you to submit your the survey properly.

Thank you everyone. 
This was our first crowdfunding campaign. If you read through the comments, you can see how much we needed to learn. We've been making watches, and selling them in the standard way for the past 13 years, but this is a whole new thing. Your questions, and ideas kept us on our toes, and made this process so enjoyable.
So...back to work. We have to actually make the watches now! All of the components are currently being produced, and will make their way to our Tokyo office soon. We will keep you posted on our progress.

updates.update_content:
Apologies. This is our first Kickstarter campaign... 
I did not know that you couldn't pledged to more than one tier in a campaign. Therefore, I will delete the additional band category.
But, if you do want an additional band, we can still do this. Please add ¥2,000 on to your current pledge, and text us that you have. We will have this in our records, and again, will confirm all of this with you after our campaign.

Well, there is only a day and a half left for this campaign, but one of our backers suggested that we include a new support section for additional bands. Again, good idea, so we added it. You can see the selection, and all of their details on our campaign page. 
You can always buy bands through our website <www.normaltimepieces.com>, but to by it through this Kickstarter campaign, you will get a huge discount, and it will be shipped along with your new watch.

One of our backers asked us if we were adding anti-reflective coating our sapphire crystal lenses. As we have never used this material before, we were not aware that it is common for this type of watch lens. Apparently, it is, and would improve the quality of Tokiji's display that much more. Therefore, we have decided to add the AR coating - with no added cost to your pledges, of course.

You learn something new every day.

We didn’t know that our watch with a sapphire crystal would be so popular. The “limited edition” 50 pieces is nearly sold out. Only two more available! Therefore, we are going to add another 50 to our Kickstarter campaign. But of course, the early backers get a better price, and will receive their watch a bit quicker.

campaign.story:
The Air Deck 2.0 is meticulously cut

Our mission is to make the ultimate travel playing cards. After the success of our first Air Deck campaign, we’ve been busy figuring out how we could improve on our original Air Deck campaign. After 18 months of work, and great feedback from the community, here are our three new designs:  
Our three new designs: Classic, Warp Speed and Astronauts Playing Cards
Our mission is to create the ultimate playing cards for travelers
52 Playing Cards + 2 jokers
Waterproof and washable
Compact travel friendly size
Light weight
Durable heavy-duty 'casino quality' 0.31mm PVC
Premium printing
Slightly textured on both sides for better handling 
Sturdy 0.4mm waterproof synthetic paper tuck box 
Playing card size : 3.43 x 1.26 inches (87 x 32mm)
FREE tracked international shipping! 
PS. When pledging, just select the number of decks you want. You get to choose which designs you want in the backer survey we send out after the campaign is over. 
Air Deck 2.0 easily fits on small surfaces, such as a plane tray table
Air Deck 2.0 is made with the same high-quality materials as the original, but we've made a couple of upgrades (apart from the new look):  
Our new decks are designed so they’re even more resilient to wear and tear.  
The boxes (including our current 1st generation Air Decks) are upgraded to .4mm waterproof synthetic paper, which makes them more durable than the .3mm we shipped with the original campaign. 
The ink on the box is now more resistant to scratching.
We'll be planting mangrove trees to offset any CO2 emitted from production and shipping of the cards.
This time around we also offer stretch goals. Several other designs were also popular in our community feedback surveys. For us to be able to offer these, we need to reach a couple milestones:
Stretch goal #1 and #2 reached!
The idea for the original Air Deck was conceived by fellow globetrotters Ursus Negenborn and Rune Kippervik while traveling South East Asia. We love playing cards, and we just couldn’t find a deck that was perfect for carrying at all times. As we’re big fans of optimization, we decided to create the ultimate playing cards for travelers ourselves. 
The Air Deck founders
The original Air Deck that started it all
With the Air Deck 2.0 we did not want to compromise on quality. We went to several of the world’s best manufacturers of premium casino cards and asked for the best materials they could provide. In the process of creating the ultimate travel deck, we tried out over 50 different high-end plastic materials. The materials were taken through scratch, bending and handling tests to identify the best candidate. Finally, we ended up with a premium ‘casino quality’ PVC that has all the properties we want for our deck.
While regular paper playing cards tear, stain, bend and break easily, Air Deck 2.0 is extremely durable
The cards grip nicely and have a premium feel
The Air Deck 2.0 takes up very little space and easily fits into your pocket
The Air Deck is incredibly resistant to tearing and bending, and is 100% waterproof. You can play with these in the pool, in the boat, in the tub, in the rain, at the beach, pretty much wherever you can think of. 
The cards are 100% waterproof, so you can even use them in the pool or the bathtub
In the process of selecting the material we sought advice from several playing card professionals, to help us find the optimal material and design. The end result is a deck that shuffles and handles like you expect professional cards to do. The cards are slightly textured on on both sides to provide excellent handling.
The Air Deck 2.0 handles well and shuffles easily
We created the new designs for Air Deck 2.0 with the wonderful feedback we’ve received from our community. 
Warp speed and Astronauts playing cards come with the same minimalist fronts as the original white decks. For our new classic design, we’ve given the jack, queen, king and the joker a more traditional look. 
Despite their smaller width, the cards are as easy to read as a standard sized decks. The full-sized length ensures that it also handles much like a full size deck, and the narrower width makes the deck fit nicely in the palm of your hands.
Our Classic design has traditional looking face cards
Warp Speed and Astronauts Playing Cards have the same minimalist look as our original deck
The Air Deck 2.0 comes with a durable waterproof synthetic paper tuck box
We love traveling this beautiful blue ball we call home, and we believe we should care for it as best we can. There’s only one earth after all. The Air Deck 2.0 is an environmentally conscious product to begin with, as it contains almost half the materials of its competitors. In addition, we’ll also offset any CO2 that’s emitted from the production and shipping of the project, by planting mangrove trees in Myanmar with Worldview International Foundation. Mangrove trees are pretty awesome, as they’re one of the most effective tools to bind CO2 to the soil and prevent it from escaping into the atmosphere. They’re ten times more effective than most other tree species, and as a bonus, they also help sustain coastal ecosystems, protect the shorelines from damage by storms and acts as a filter to maintain water quality. The more decks that gets pledged, the more trees will be planted. 
We will plant mangrove trees with World View International Foundation

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.
This project is promoted by Green Inbox
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The designs of the cards have been finalized, and we’ve made the prototypes you see in the video. Since this is our second project, we’ve ironed out the kinks, and we feel confident that we can deliver a great product. Logistics has already been worked thoroughly out, and we will ship tracked to all customers, to ensure a reliable delivery. Our factory is standing by, and will start production as soon as we are funded. As with any project, unforeseen events can occur, but we've done everything we can to keep unknown factors to a minimum. As we are continuously improving our products, there could be minor adjustments to the decks seen in the video.

campaign.story:
Home is a sacred place. Don’t let bad air ruin it. With Wynd Halo and the Wynd Home Purifier, you can monitor—and physically perfect—your environment. 
Wynd Halo has 10 sensors to monitor allergens, smoke, germs, pollution, and more. It features a new innovation called Air ID which classifies the actual pollutants in the air so that you can take the right course of action. Wynd Halo pairs seamlessly with the Wynd Home Purifier to remove any contaminants from your environment quickly and automatically.
 We take 20,000 breaths every day, but what’s in the air we’re breathing? Wynd Halo can tell you and make it better. 
Wynd Halo monitors the air and gives you a summary of your environment at a glance.
Wynd Halo houses more sensors than any other environmental monitor. It also introduces a new technology called Air ID, which determines the actual composition of your air—from pollen, to pet dander, to smog—so that you can take the right course of action to improve your environment. 
Wynd Halo fits in anywhere. You can put it in the bedroom, office, or baby’s room—and mount it on the wall using the wall-mount accessory (available as an add-on).
 Most air quality sensors just measure the general concentration of things (particles or chemicals), but can’t tell you what’s actually there. We think it’s important for you to know whether your air has pollen, forest fire smoke,  or smog from the nearby industrial plant.
Over the past two years we’ve developed an innovative technology called Air ID. By combining raw sensor data with contextual data from the cloud, Air ID can tell you what you are actually breathing.
In response to issues detected via Air ID, the Wynd app can recommend actions to help you stay healthy.
Get recommendations from the Wynd app based on Halo's analysis of your environment (iOS and Android)
See surrounding air quality and environmental information for a global network of air quality stations via the Air Bubbles network.
In addition, the Wynd app can alert you of any major issues in your environment so that you can quickly react to serious issues.
Just let Wynd Halo know what you’re doing, and it’ll optimize your environment for that activity.
Halo will launch with 5 customizable optimizations. In each setting, Halo can activate connected devices such as purifiers (including the Wynd Home Purifier), thermostats, humidifiers, and lights. Over time, we’ll be adding more optimizations via software updates.
To change temperature, light, and more, Halo works with platforms such as Alexa, Nest, and Apple HomeKit. 
We designed the Wynd Home Purifier to work seamlessly with Wynd Halo. Wynd Halo monitors the air, and the Wynd Home Purifier cleans it up. The Home Purifier uses Halo data to remove allergens, mold, germs, chemicals, odors, and air pollution from your home.
The Wynd Home Purifier achieves rapid cleaning speeds by using 2x the filter surface area of typical purifiers and precision turbine engineering. This design increases airflow while lowering noise—meaning it can clean quickly and quietly.
The Wynd Home Purifier isn’t just any air purifier. It’s the most powerful air purifier in its class, able to clean 537 cubic meters of air per hour—or, 1,200 square feet in 30 minutes.
* Class is defined as connected (wifi and app-enabled) air purifiers with prices less than $500 USD. 
The V-Series HEPA filter is designed to clean a broad range of pollutants in your environment, including both particles and gases.
The Wynd Home Purifier uses a proprietary HEPA filter that removes particulates and gases, including allergens, mold, germs, toxic odors, air pollution, and more. 
The Wynd Home Purifier’s filter removes pollutants big and small from the air.
In addition, the filter material is embedded with silver to kill germs. In third-party testing, the filter killed 99.97% of staphylococcus aureus (staph) and escherichia coli (E. coli) bacteria that was on the material. 
At its core, Wynd Home Purifier works seamlessly with the Wynd Halo so you shouldn’t need to make any manual adjustments. After pairing with the Halo, the Wynd Home Purifier goes to work when needed to maintain a healthy and clean environment.
The Wynd Home Purifier doesn't just operate on full blast all day: It only turns on when needed. With smart scheduling, if you’re not home, the purifier can turn down automatically. It turns up a couple hours before you get home, so that the air's fresh when you return—and it even lowers its volume when you're home, so that you can enjoy a quiet atmosphere. Smart scheduling saves electricity and extends filter life.
It can also work with other IOT platforms, like Alexa and Apple HomeKit, to control its cleaning power.    
With automatic optimizations and integration with internet connected devices, your Halo and Home Purifier can automatically optimize the air around you for whatever you're doing.
We are honored to be working once again on industrial design with Mike Nuttall, the co-founder of the world-famous design firm, IDEO. His focus on making technology products intuitive, elegant, and timeless is core to our philosophy at Wynd, and can be seen in many elements of the Wynd Halo. See below for his narration of the Halo design story. 
We went through dozens of different designs before finalizing the shape and function of the Wynd Halo
Working on the CAD design of the Halo
Design of the Wynd v2.0 app, which will support both existing Wynd products as well as the Wynd Halo, Wynd Home Purifier, and future products to come
The Wynd Halo houses 10 unique sensors that provide insights into each facet of your environment. Each sensor is tuned to monitor key health and comfort metrics.
When we needed a PM (particulate matter) sensor for our first product in 2015, we realized there wasn’t one available that was right for us—so we got our in-house team of MIT alums to invent one. Since then, we’ve had a lot of time to improve it. The latest version is highly accurate, measures various particle sizes, syncs with the cloud, and automatically recalibrates. 
Wynd Halo houses a particulate matter (PM) module which classifies particles at a highly granular level. Every second, over 100,000 readings are analyzed.
We also improved the laser: The new PM sensor uses a blue laser—which has a finer wavelength—to measure particles as small as 0.1 microns (700x smaller than the diameter of human hair). These particles are key elements of pollution, allergens, dander, and germs.
Wynd’s PM module uses a blue laser at 402 nanometers to measure particulates as small as 0.1 microns. Other PM sensors use red lasers which are far less precise.
On the hardware, Halo analyzes the measurements from the PM sensor 100,000 times per second to determine the size and fundamentals of various pollutants.
The PM module can generate highly detailed particulate models, such as this one—which shows the profile of household dust and dander.
In addition to particulate matter, Halo includes a number of other sensors, including volatile organic compound (VOC), temperature, humidity, light, noise, and others—so that you can get the full profile of your environment. 
Wynd Halo combines measurements from all of its sensors to produce actionable information about your environment.
Most pollution sensors measure things in generality. For example, particulate sensors report only report dust concentration and size. We wanted to go deeper and ask the question: What is the actual composition of the air? Is it pollen, dander, smog, or something else?
Using a combination of hardware sensors, machine learning algorithms, and cloud data, Wynd Halo can determine the actual composition of pollutants in your air—from plant pollen to traffic pollution. Knowing the composition of what’s in your air is fundamental to taking the right action.
The Wynd Home Purifier was specifically designed to maximize airflow. Most purifiers use one filter, but ours uses two: This doubles the air intake area, so that the purifier can output massive amounts of air. Dual filters create super-fast cleaning speeds and significantly lengthen filter life.
The purifier houses a powerful turbofan which spins at 987 RPM to clean your space quickly. At max, the Wynd Home Purifier generates 537 cubic meters of air per hour, which is enough to clean a 1,200 square foot space in under 30 minutes.
Internals of the Wynd Home Purifier showing the powerful turbofan, capable of spinning at 987 RPM to generate over 537 cubic meters of clean air per hour
Here's a quick demo of the Wynd Home Purifier in action:
The Wynd Home Purifier cleans a tank full of pollutants in 30 seconds.

We created Wynd out of a need to enable healthy and comfortable environments for ourselves and our families wherever we go. 
Ray (founder) frequently traveled to Asia, where poor air quality is a well-known problem. He hated the way pollution made him feel, and wanted to be able to take healthy air with him on the go. We launched our first product, a smart and portable air purifier, on Kickstarter in 2016 and it became the most funded air purifier ever. 
We are excited to be back and introduce two products, Wynd Halo and Wynd Home Purifier, that bring worry-free, fresh air to your home.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any smart hardware project, there are natural risks and challenges in engineering and manufacturing. The final manufacturing timeline could face delays due to technical difficulties, supply chain issues, and other reasons. 

However, we've done our best to minimize risks for backers: We’ve mass produced multiple products in the tens of thousands of units before, including the Wynd Personal Purifier on Kickstarter in 2016. In addition, we already have fully working prototypes that have demonstrated all the key functionality. We also have already been working with our factory for over half a year in preparing for the evaluation, design, and production validation phases to come. Our electronics and firmware are also at an advanced stage. In addition, the accompanying Wynd app is being developed and on track.

We'll do our best to be as transparent as possible and keep you informed, and work hard to resolve any issues as they may arise. If you have any questions or concerns please don’t hesitate to reach out to us directly.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We’re so passionate about this project, that we’re committed to doing everything in our power to solve any challenges that may arise along the way – that’s a promise!

Here are a few risks and challenges that we can think of:

Product Manufacturing Delays

• We’ve produced a small run of samples and we feel confident that a large production order will be successful; however, it is common that factories can have unforeseen setbacks. 
• We plan to stay in constant communication with our manufacturer including working on-site to resolve any challenges that may arise.

Shipping Delays

• Shipping a large number of products at once can be a daunting task for a small team. 
• To help us with this challenge, we’ve segmented the shipping process into groups. 
• Early birds will get their products first. Regular orders will get their products second. All other orders will be processed as soon as possible after the Kickstarter orders have been sent out.

Lost Packages

• We’ve had some experience shipping products internationally, including lost packages. 
• Even if it means sending out a product three times, we are committed to make sure it gets into your hands.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: NEW KICKSTARTER Campaign from HYDAWAY is NOW LIVE!
updates.update_content:
WE ARE LIVE!
As official HYDAWAY family, we wanted you to be the first to know about our newest campaign. 
Click here to check out our new campaign on Kickstarter. Scroll down for more details!

Hello 2018 HYDAWAY Kickstarter Backers!  It's been too long since our last update, and I hope all of you are continuing to enjoy your HYDAWAY H2.0 Collapsible Water Bottles. And that they have helped you avoid single-use plastics as you travel the world! 💦
As inspirational Kickstarter backers, I think you will want to check out our latest innovation! It's another pocket-sized tool to help you in the fight against single-use plastic waste and the microplastics that are in the food we eat, the water we drink, and the air we breathe. 🌍
Introducing the HYDAWAY Collapsible Drink Tumbler!

Hello Kickstater backers,
I hope everyone in the HYDAWAY community is staying safe and sane through these trying times. We are thinking of you all, especially those on the front lines working to save lives, provide essential services, and combat the effects of this horrible pandemic. More on how you can help us to help them below.
I had planned to reach out to all of you today to announce our FIFTH Kickstarter campaign, but unfortunately we have postponed the launch of our brand new, super awesome, packable hydration product for a few months. We will continue to hammer out the design & manufacturing logistics as the supply side of the business is back on track, despite the huge shift in shopping habits right now.

Hello Kickstarter Backers!
If you missed our most recent campaign for our new Cleaning Tablets and Bottle Brush, fear not, we just opened a pre-order store and we've extended our 10% off backers-only pricing to all of you as well. This includes our new cleaning products AND the rest of our product line!

updates.update_userinfo: We Want to Hear From You! 👋
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers!
My apologies for the long delay between updates. Many of you requested to only be alerted when concrete information was ready. Since we were so close to shipping, I was waiting for tracking numbers to be sent out.
By now, many of you should have received your rewards or at least a tracking number to track your shipment.

updates.update_userinfo: All Remaining Rewards Shipping by End of Month!
updates.update_content:
Hello backers,
Hope you are enjoying spring weather wherever you are and are able to get outside and enjoy it!
I know it's been a few weeks since our last update, but we wanted to make sure we had good and relevant news to share, and finally we do!

Happy Friday, backers!
I just wanted to send out a super quick update to let you all know that we are fully in production, and should be wrapping up soon to start shipping on April 8th. Yay!
You'll receive an email with tracking as soon as your order ships, so that's how you'll know it's on its way to you.

Happy Saturday, backers! 
I just wanted to send a quick update to all of you on the progress we've made since our last update.
Production on the 25oz bottles continues, and our partners are working on getting all the other parts finished for seamless assembly as soon as the bottles are ready. We're talking about lids, printing & assembling the packaging, UPC stickers for each box (so we know what color bottle is inside), and printing the logos on each bottle...just to name a few! There are so many moving parts that need to all come together to make each bottle; it's pretty amazing.

updates.update_userinfo: The Puzzle Pieces Are Coming Together!
updates.update_content:
Hello backers, this is the update you’ve been waiting for!
I’m back from visiting all of our factories, and am super excited to provide an update to all of you. Thank you for your patience this week as we dig our homes out from a record-setting snowstorm that closed schools, airports, and businesses across the state.

campaign.story:
Our new line of watches is crafted from Humanium Metal, a material that is made from destructed illegal firearms. The result? A watch crafted with the utmost care that carries a strong symbolic value and contributes to rebuilding conflict torn societies.
At TRIWA, we have developed watches for over ten years with the goal of transforming the industry. With our Humanium Metal watches we’ll be taking this transformation to the next level by creating watches from the metal of destructed illegal firearms. With your help, we will make a contribution in the fight against armed violence.
We've partnered with non-profit organization IM Swedish Development Partner, which retrieves and melts down illegal firearms from conflict torn societies, turning them into Humanium Metal. We then buy the metal, refine and mold it into watch cases that are later made into TRIWA x Humanium Metal Watches. 
The very purchase of Humanium Metal makes a difference: a portion of funds made from the sale circles back to the society where the firearms were originally collected and supports the victims of armed violence.
We have treated the Humanium Metal with the respect it deserves, molding it into a solitaire piece with contrasting metal treatments. The watch is filled with symbolic references, such as the Humanium Metal logo that is punched on the case, the embossed indexes on the dial and the fiery red second hand, date display and crown center.
 You’ll be able to choose from two sizes: 39 or 34 millimeters with either a vertically brushed dark grey dial or light steel dial. Our latest model is the Hu39-DA which features automatic movement and comes in recycled green canvas, and black or brown tanned leather.  (Now avaialble in a light version as well!)
All TRIWA x Humanium Metal watches backed on Kickstarter will exclusively come with a scratch resistant sapphire glass and each model is numbered to designate the order in which the watch was produced.
Humanium Metal by IM is an award winning material made from destructed illegal firearms and melted into a usable metal. The metal is crafted out of something that used to be a destructive force, now turned into something good. The sales from Humanium Metal generate financial resources used to rebuild conflict torn societies and support victims of armed violence. 
Humanium Metal is part of IM Swedish Development Partner’s strategy to help fulfill United Nations Sustainable Development Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development.
The Humanium Metal has been refined into 316L stainless steel to meet the high standards of an everyday wristwatch.
By buying a TRIWA x Humanium Metal watch, you can help the world become a more peaceful place. 
1. IM Swedish Development Partner collects illegal firearms from conflict torn societies
2. The weapons are deconstructed, separating metal from wood
3. Afterwards, the parts are melted in a furnace and casted into what we now call Humanium Metal
4. This is where TRIWA comes in. After purchasing Humanium Metal, we will use the material to craft our new collection, allowing monetary funds to circle back to the conflict torn societies where the firearms were collected.
The collection consists of 4 models and a variety of straps to choose from. Each model is molded from the Humanium Metal in a classic, three hand configuration with punched indexes and a contrasting red second hand, date display and crown. All watches come with either an olive green canvas strap made from recycled plastic or a Swedish organically tanned leather strap in black, brown or tan colour.
All TRIWA x Humanium Metal watches come in an exclusively made box with an imprinted TRIWA x Humanium Metal logo and a certificate of authenticity.
 **NEW**
Anyone who upgrades their pledge (by $44 / SEK 389 / €38 / £34) can get an additional strap at a 35% discount, along with special packaging and a tool to help you switch straps. 
The Humanium Metal initiative by IM has been endorsed by many international peace advocates.
We are a Swedish watch and accessory brand founded in 2007 by four friends Harald, Tobias, Didrik and Ludvig. Our goal is to transform the watch industry through innovation, creativity and design. And, our name TRIWA is an acronym for TRansforming the Industry of WAtches.
We are also proud to be the Stockholm city timekeeper with 34 clocks around the city.
The Team Behind TRIWA x Humanium Metal
Tobias Ericson - Sales Director & Co-founder
Johan Imbro - International Sales Manager  
Ludvig Scheja - Creative Director & Co-founder
Tove Thambert - Head of Product Design
Didrik Wachtmeister - Head of Production & Co-founder
Rebecca Ericson - Social Media Manager
Harald Wachtmeister - CEO & Co-founder
Each watch comes with a certificate from IM, Swedish Development Partner, ensuring the material’s authenticity.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Delivery time: We’ve been working with the same supplier for almost ten years and we have a really close working collaboration. However, in manufacturing, there's always a risk of delays. We have added some buffer to minimize the risk and we will be in constant contact with our supplier to ensure a timely delivery. 
 
We'll update you with the progress and let you know if there would be any delays.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
FastCompany / Abduzeedo / Highsnobiety / Master Horologer / GESSATO / Minimalissimo / Chaussures de Cool / Cool Tech HD / Geeky Gadgets / Trend Hunter
Last year, we launched The Trio of Time, a collaboration where we visit three different cities around the globe to partner with local designers and explore their perception of time. 
We're thrilled to introduce our newest collaboration—"Order"—a timepiece inspired by New York City.
Order comes in a white, red, or black watchface.
The second edition of the Trio of Time, Order reframes our perception of time.
The simple design is made of a perforated watchface with a dot for each hour.
Small grooves on the watch's frame line up in 15 minute increments.
The Swiss ronda caliber movement allows for incredibly smooth spinning—you won't even notice the movement.
All watch straps are interchangeable, for the perfect look to fit your mood or outfit.
Order—BLUE with black leather strap. (1st stretch goal)
Order—RED with black leather strap.
Order—WHITE with silver Milanese mesh bracelet.
Order—BLACK with black Milanese mesh bracelet.
Order watches fit any size wrist.
The modern design is an instant classic.
Inspired by the fast pace of NYC and the iconic NYCTA Subway signage.
How to read the time
Order has no watch hands. Instead, the entire watchface is perforated with an ascending number of dots, which rotate to align with the frame and tell the time in 15 minute intervals. 
The designers hope to inspire the wearer to not worry so much about the exact time; instead, to focus on the world around them.
For everyone
The 40mm case is designed for both men and women.  
Order runs on a Ronda 512 Swiss Parts Movement.  
The watch has a 316L stainless-steel enclosed casing, available in black or silver. 
The casing is ultra thin—only 8.7mm.
All straps are interchangeable with TTT#1—Hidden Time Watch—thanks to the smart docking system.
Ultra thin—only 8.7mm (0.34in).
Creating Order 
For the Order watch, we partnered with graphic designers Hamish Smyth and Jesse Reed from their design office of the same name, Order.
Order compliments the NYCTA Graphics Standards Manual.
Hamish and Jesse met while working at Pentagram under Michael Bierut, where they launched many well-known design projects, such as the Mastercard rebrand and the Hillary for America presidential logo. While at Pentagram, they started their independent publishing imprint Standards Manual, beginning with the reissue of the NYCTA Graphics Standards Manual (launched here on Kickstarter!).
The duo working on the NYCTA Standards Manual.
Over the next couple years, they also reissued the NASA and EPA Graphics Standards Manuals on Kickstarter—raising over $2 million combined—along with self-publishing four other titles. Following their departure from Pentagram, the duo opened the only bookstore in New York specializing in graphic design. It sits right in front of their design office, Order. 
The Standards Manual shop in Greenpoint, Brooklyn.
Hamish and Jesse’s work with the NYCTA Graphics Standards Manual inspired their design for the watch, where they focused on representing time in a simple, graphic form. As the face rotates, the perforated dots reveal the hour indicated by an alignment with the frame. The wearer is then able to conceive time as a series of ordered dots that multiply as the day progresses, allowing for a new perception of time.
Circular icons in the NYC Subway signage.
Early order sketches and ideas.
Preliminary designs for Order.
Developing the watchface.
The 12-hour cycle.
Each watch face displays time in the same way.
 
Smart docking system
Straps are available in white or black leather, or silver or black Milanese mesh (you will choose during the survey process).
Order comes with an interchangeable strap system that secures straps with a simple pull and click within seconds. You can find out more about our straps from our Hidden Time campaign. 
The smart docking system allows for easy strap swaps.
Each TTT edition comes in unique packaging designed especially for the collaboration.
The watch also comes with a limited edition collector's plaque.
Packaging design for Order and Hidden Time.
About The Trio of Time
The Series 000, Series K452, Hidden Time, and Order watches from Anicorn.
Through The Trio of Time, we have the privilege of collaborating with local designers from incredible cities around the world. Together, we create a unique timepiece and bring our story to Kickstarter, where backers then help us bring the project to life, and choose our next destination.
The watch and strap combinations between Hidden Time and Order are endless.
Stunning black and white leather straps for Hidden Time and Order.
In 2017, we began in Seoul with Korean designer Jiwoong Jung, who designed the first timepiece of the series, Hidden Time. The campaign was successfully funded within 48 hours from more than 2,000 backers worldwide.
Order expands our vision to challenge the perceptions of time.
The first edition of the Trio of Time, Hidden Time.
We're really excited to be launching this second edition in New York City—the destination our backers chose from the first TTT campaign. If Order is a success, you will help us choose our next stop on this journey!
Why Kickstarter? 
Kickstarter has allowed us to not only bring our timepieces to life, but also establish our business. Most importantly, it has gifted us with a strong community that supports the work we do. 
We are deeply humbled by your support, and we can't wait to keep bringing you exciting projects. 
Order's watchface is just the right size for wrists small and large.
Thank you!
Your support will help us make Order a reality.
After successful funding, you'll help us decide on our next city to visit.
Anicorn's The Trio of Time will then collaborate with a new designer, in a new city, to tell a new story.
Join us on our journey to complete The Trio of Time.
